fields.question: What clothing items do Identity Clothing sell?
fields.answer: We sell a selection of hoodies, t-shirts and shorts for both men & women. You can view all of the current products we have on our products page.

fields.question: What sizes do we offer?
fields.answer: We offer sizes ranging from XXS - XXL for all of our products.

fields.question: Can I view my order history?
fields.answer: Yes, you can view your order history by loggin into your account and navigating to your account profile.

fields.question: Can I update my delivery information?
fields.answer: Yes, you can view your order history by loggin into your account and navigating to your account profile.

fields.question: How do I contact Identity Clothing?
fields.answer: We sell a selection of hoodies, t-shirts and shorts for both men & women. You can view all of the current products we have on our products page.

fields.question: What is the delivery charge?
fields.answer: Delivery is FREE of charge for orders £50 or more. However the delivery charge for orders under £50 will be 10% of the total price of the order.

fields.question: Can I return my order?
fields.answer: Yes, you can return your order to us within the first 7 days of your purchase by contacting us using the contact form above. If you have had the item for more than 7 days, you will not be able to return your item.

fields.question: Can I cancel my order?
fields.answer: No, if you have already placed the order and received the order confirmation email, you can no longer cancel your order.

fields.question: Where is my order?
fields.answer: Please allow up to 5-7 working days for your order to arrive, if you have not received your order within this time frame. Please contact us using the contact form above.
